**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

as per the [documentation](https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/master/Documentation/ceph-csi-drivers.md#create-rbac-used-by-csi-drivers-in-the-same-namespace-as-rook-ceph-operator) we need to create the namespace `rook-ceph-system` before deploying the CSI driver, but rook-ceph-system namespace is created as part of the operator [deployment](https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/master/Documentation/ceph-quickstart.md#deploy-the-rook-operator).

**Expected behavior:**

CSI deployment should be successful if we follow documentation.

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
follow the [documentation](https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/master/Documentation/ceph-csi-drivers.md to deploy ceph-csi driver.
